problem.p: Sometimes you will want partially-ordered input. In the following example, we want "Halloween" in the first box, and "ghost", "bat" and "pumpkin" in any order in the other boxes.
problem.script: from mitxgraders import * grader = ListGrader( answers=[ 'Halloween', ['bat', 'ghost', 'pumpkin'] ], subgraders=[ StringGrader(), ListGrader( subgraders=StringGrader() ) ], ordered=True, grouping=[1, 2, 2, 2] )
problem.p: Note that repeating an object will be graded incorrectly.
